body:
This is panic I got.
exactly on iteration in this function (mgc.go):
```go
func clearcheckmarkbits() {
    for _, s := range work.spans { // <--- here
        if s.state == _MSpanInUse {
            clearcheckmarkbitsspan(s)
        }
    }
}
```
